name: resuplex
description: AI-Powered Resume Builder to help users craft the perfect resume.

scripts.start: docker-compose up -d && wait-on tcp:5432 && npm run db:migrate && concurrently "npm:frontend" "npm:backend"
scripts.backend: cd packages/backend && npx tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/backend && npm run prisma -- migrate dev --name init
